column4: I need help with Wireless connections, I cant logon to the network... Isnt there any wireless manager? like wlassistant... but it only works on kde... ?? anyone please
are you connecting to a wireless router?  802.11b/g?
yes... but I think I found it... but why isnt there any better graphic manager?
there is no gui config installed with ubuntu by default ..I think there are probably guis out ther
but you can do it on the command line
you need the WEP key from your router
eth0      Failed to read scan data : Operation not supported
when you type iwconfig, what do you get?
wut kind of wireless card do you have? you might need to load a kernel module
thx anyway... will be back tomorrow :D
